name: Herding for Disaster
description:
In this game, created in about 3.5 hours for Trijam 134, you play as a dog herding cows into a barn to escape a tornado.  

Let's not think about why the tornado can't destroy the barn too...  It's called suspension of disbelief, people.  Come on!

The game uses the Enter key to begin, arrow keys to play, and R to restart.

I made the game, graphics, and most sound effects.  

Other credits:

  • wind and moo sounds from Zapsplat.com
  • The wonderful music is:
    Takeover of the 8-bit Synths Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
